com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.proxies

Class ProxyBase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.proxies.ProxyBase<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - - type of Proxy base
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Proxy<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockProxy, BlockStateProxy, EntityProxy, EventExecutorProxy, InventoryProxy

    public class ProxyBase<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Proxy<T>
    A base class for classes redirecting method calls to another class instance. For example, you can make a Proxy of a List so it will alter elements in another List instance than itself.
